name: Resume/CV Template
description:
Professional Resume Templates for Designers.


What's inside:

  • Figma file of 3 editable resume templates that can be exported as PDF
  • Instructions and Personal Use License included
  • Style Guide



4 templates created for you

Time has a critical role for designers. You can lose critical times when you design resumes. No worries! I've got you covered, with this template you will have 4 unique and ready-to-use resumes.


Easy to use, editable on Figma

The files are in Figma (.fig) format, you will need a Figma account and open it via Figma. On Figma, you can pick a template, customize the designs, add your own URLs, export as PDF, change fonts with a few clicksâ€”And you're done!


Add hyperlinks to your Resume

Highlight the text that you'd like to hyperlink, and click CMD+K (or Ctrl+K for PC users), then key in the URL.


Multilingual

You'll get 2 languages of every single template. Turkish & English


Auto Layout

I've created these resumes by using auto layout. You don't have to think about arranging elements. Just write your information and done!


Export as an A4 size PDF

1. Select the frame on Figma

2. Click on Export on the right sidebar

3. Select PDF

4. Click on the Export button

5. Done!


For personal use only

You may use this for personal use only. You may modify the templates according to your requirements. This product may not be used in any way whatsoever in which you charge money, collect fees, or receive any form of remuneration. You cannot resell, relicense, or sub-license this product.
